name: Royal Food Pack IV
description: With a deep understanding of most ingredients, the chef is skillful at cooking, Nothing for him is ever a tricky problem. (Open the pack to find some advanced food ingredients)

name: Royal Jelly
description: Collected from honey, this is a special food for the Queen Bee, very good for health. It restores 20% HP and removes all abnormalities. If used during PVP, the HP Regen will reduce and CD time will be longer.

name: Royal Pike
description: The pikes used by the Prontera Royal Guards are equipped with the best brass handles and snowflake silver tips.

name: Royal Pike [2]
description: The pikes used by the Prontera Royal Guards are equipped with the best brass handles and snowflake silver tips.

name: Royal Silver Shield
description: The royal decorative shield, In actual combat, it also used as a weapon

name: Royal Silver Shield [1]
description: The royal decorative shield, In actual combat, it also used as a weapon

name: Ruby Mystery Bag
description: To honor the love and protection for the past 6 months. Open it to see what's inside!

name: Rudolph Mysterious Box
description: Hoho, This is Rudolph's Christmas gift for everyone. And let me tell you, there is a chance to get the amazing Christmas Song headwear!

name: Rudolph's Horn [1]
effect: Melee Dmg ＋5%,When strength reaches 200, ignore Def ＋5%

name: Rudra Bow [1]
description: With divine power, it can create high damage and bring the player's potential all out.

name: Rudra Bow [2]
description: With divine power, it can create high damage and bring the player's potential all out.

name: Rune Armor
description: The runes on clothes are ancient words that contain magic forces.
effect: Damage reduction of undead/demon race ＋20%,Damage reduction of other -20%

name: Rune Armor [1]
description: The runes on clothes are ancient words that contain magic forces.
effect: Damage reduction of undead/demon race ＋20%,Damage reduction of other -20%

name: Rune Boots
description: With bronzed light and carved with sacred spell, the boots have great defensive power.

name: Rune Boots [1]
description: With bronzed light and carved with sacred spell, the boots have great defensive power.

name: Rune Circlet
description: Crown made according to the dress style of Rune Knight with rune magic power.
effect: Str ＋2,When Strength reaches 120, Atk ＋10, Refine Atk ＋10
